post.body: btw nick....HOT DOG! giggle
Yeah, it's definitely not me.
You know, Adam, it's bad that I follow you but you don't follow me :(
I swear it wasn't me!
Welcome back.
I won't quit you adam and I'm sure Nick won't either! but you need to bring your happy ass back to Kansas!!!! hehe
At least you still have tons of followers though :o) I only have 3 :o(. Never have been great with popularity :oP
ugh. I don't know. That sucks :o(
@adamlofland Well that's a given!
Why only 4 1/2? What caused it to lose a half star? hehe
What do you mean?
Everything will work out as it should, my friend. I have faith.
I'm very fortunate to have you as my friend as well, Scooter.
Your real friends will always be there for you. I know I haven't known you long but yer a cool guy :o)
Why let a couple of silly people ruin your fun. Don't delete it :o)
It's okay, Adam. Nick and I still love ya and we are your real friends!
Holy Fuck. That sucks dude!
Again, paint me jealous. Bad bad Jen
I'm TOTALLY jealous :oP
WINE!!!! Drooooooool
Despite my opinions, I suppose if you knew someone who knew that person, it wouldn't be so bad.
I sent my answer to that through myspace :P
Had a great time last night!
Looking forward to tonight!
hehe. Maintenance guy put all new parts on my apartment heater only to find out the breaker went bad.
I love my friends :o)
I just want today over with. Tired of working and really tired of worrying about my dad.
doesn't see the point of twitter anymore. No one follows him or cares what he says.
can't wait till Friday. So many good things going on that day!
:o( How come hot guys don't ask me to be their dates to the prom? Instead they ask the straight guy :P
Bored at work again. Can't wait till Friday!
I have the greatest roommie ever. Too bad he'll be moving soon probably.
I won't be surprised if I lose him.
I get to ring New Years in alone...again. Yea me.
I know I've been an ass lately, but I am who I am.
Don't you hate it when you get plenty of sleep but for whatever reason you are exhausted?!?!
I have a great best friend who deserves all the best things life can bring him!
What I wouldn't do for a bottle of wine tonight so I can just pour a glass and relax in a bath.
I'm gonna be bored without my roomie to hang out with tonight!
OMFG how are you gonna call me for help with no picture on your tv when you can't even figure out how to turn your tv on!!!!
